runs.comm: beaten, short of a good length outside off and held its line, Watson played for the turn and missed
turning in from a good length outside off, gets outside the line and defends
short outside off and appears to hold its line again, Watson shapes to play the cut, misses, some extra bounce there for the spinner
short of a good length, gets on the back foot and works it to midwicket
accurate here, just a fraction outside off and getting it to turn in from a good length, pushed to extra cover, lovely start
and it's a maiden, short of a good length, turning in, punched off the back foot to mid-off, excellent start by Harbhajan
smacked for four, short outside off, cuts it in that gap between cover and point, races to the boundary
some swing there for Nehra, getting it to shape away, lands on a good length, knocks it down into the off side
good bounce, takes off from a good length, drops it from the crease just wide of midwicket for a single
shortish outside off, reaches to play the cut but does not connect, much quicker than he would have expected
short and he takes full toll this time, gets forward and shovels it high and handsome over long-on for a big six
short of a good length, opens the face and guides that one to third man to keep the strike
turning in, gets forward, bends low and goes for the sweep, struck high on the pads
dropped, a tough chance but he could have clasped it, short on leg stump and it's swept hard and Jadeja at square leg tries to take it over his head while moving to his right but is unable to hold on
goes for the sweep again, targeting square leg, misses and is struck high on the pads
flighted, lands full on the off, driven hard down the ground to long-on for a single
coming round the wicket and floating it on a good length on the off, makes room to crack that through the off side, mistimes it to extra cover
much quicker, short of a good length on middle, turned into the leg side towards midwicket
tight line, lands on a good length on the off, pushed to extra cover
comes down the track and chips it over midwicket, long-on gets round to it in time to keep them to a single
slower through the air, slightly short outside off, turning away, played to point
That's over the roof, long hop, got into position early, moved back and pulled it powerfully over the stands, among the biggest sixes we've seen this tournament
another one, short one again, Jadeja gifting freebies here, Watson gets back and pulls it over wide long-on, just over mind you but a poor ball nevertheless
We won't see Jadeja in this game for a while after this, three short deliveries in a row, this time on middle and leg and Watson dispatches it into the crowd behind square for another big one
pushed off the front foot wide of extra cover for a single
short, went on straight but Watson, unlike in the first over, was ready. Moved back and cut it well past a diving point for a boundary
really slow through the air this time, played the sweep to early, landed on a good length and struck him on the waist, Bowden says no, it could have just gone over
slog-swept but straight towards deep midwicket for a single
pushed through the line towards long-off for a single
fetching it from a good length outside off, drags it towards deep midwicket for one more, another tidy over from Harbhajan
trying to push it full outside off, defends it with an open face and it rolls towards third man
cracked off the back foot towards point, Raina dives to his left and palms it towards Yusuf who returns a strong throw to the bowler's end and concedes an overthrow
came off the meat, a length delivery in the slot outside off and Warner hits it through the line over long-off for a six
held back the length, short on middle, jabs it towards midwicket
just a fraction short outside off and Warner wants to dismiss it into the stands over square leg, misses
short of a good length on middle, turned away towards deep midwicket for a single
fires it on a good length outside off, taps it through point for a single
pushing it quick, mistimes a sweep towards deep square leg, was a little late on the shot
bowls it on a good length outside off and he cracks it hard towards deep cover for one more
slightly short outside off, dragged to deep midwicket for one more
short of a good length on middle, worked wide of midwicket for a single
ooh, almost, short and he tries to swing it over midwicket, misses and it just escapes off stump
short of a good length on the off, punched towards point
picked it from a length on middle, Warner had picked his spot and smacked it over midwicket, Yuvraj runs to his left from long-on but can't cut it off
knocked away wide of midwicket for a single
clearing the ropes comfortably here, confident shot, bowled on a good length, made room and swung it over long-on
aiming for the yorker there, almost gets it right, pushes it past the bowler for a single
Ouch, that must hurt, Watson gets struck by Warner, full toss and it's drilled back straight to the non-striker, they manage a single somehow
extra bounce, Warner had prepared himself for a cut, tries to cut it past point, misses
shortish, pushed off the back foot to point
worked off the back foot past midwicket for a single
picked the length early there, pulled away to deep midwicket for a single
short of a good length on middle, makes room and dabs it back to the bowler
short again, slaps it just wide of long-on and rushes back for the second
..to be smashed for another six! Unlike his previous deliveries, that one was bowled on a length, cleared his right foot and struck it flat over long-on
five consecutive sixes off Jadeja, tossed it up, came down the track and chipped it into that gap between long-on and deep midwicket, timed it well enough to clear the ropes
six sixes in a row off Jadeja, bowled it flat this time but it was a length delivery on the off stump, made a bit of room and thrashed it into the stands over long-on
short and wide, extra bounce, breaks the run, tries to cut, misses
bowled full, struck hard along the ground back to the bowler, dives to stop that, it crashes into the stumps at the other end
fired it short and wide, Warner had charged forward, tried to cut it through point, got an inside edge past the keeper for a single
pulled away towards deep square leg for a single
some turn there as well as extra bounce, adjusts well, taking his bottom hand off and playing it down with soft hands, a single behind point to bring up his half-century
Watson gets to his fifty in style, another long hop, short outside off and it's hammered over deep midwicket
gone, kept a little low, didn't bounce as much as he wanted to, short of a good length and he tried to repeat the shot from the previous ball, missed and was bowled
pushed it full on middle, driven down towards long-on for a single
drops it in front of point for a single
slower one bowled short on middle, knocked it down in front of cover for a single
banged it short outside off, looked a little off balanced when he struck that but he managed to smear it over deep midwicket, a flat six
short of a good length, pushed towards cover for a single
short of a good length, gets on the back foot and knocks it down into the leg side
slightly short, didn't rise as much, punched towards extra cover
The attack continues, short of a good length, Warner moves away and pulls it miles over deep midwicket
fires it short on middle, makes room and opens the face to play it behind point for a single
No letting up from David Hussey here, slower through the air, he made room and lofted it cleanly over wide long-off for six
played down the ground towards long-on for a single
hurling it on the off, dabs it wide of point to keep the strike
not treating him any differently, hammered over long-on, India's misery continues
a hit and a miss, tries to smote it over long-on, misses
flighted, lands on a length and Warner backs himself again, bending low and slog-sweeping it over deep midwicket
short of a good length outside off, cracked hard towards deep cover

India will be relieved, short outside off, much quicker, tries to crash it hard through the off side, some extra bounce there, gets an edge and Dhoni snaps it, no doubt in the umpire's mind, that was out
shortish outside off, turning in, dabs it behind point for a single
closes the face and works it through square leg for a single
comes round the wicket, pushes it quick and full on the off stump, driven to long-off
gets across and pushes it in front of midwicket
varying in pace, quicker, bowled on a good length on middle, plays it back to the bowler
the end of an excellent spell, pushed full on middle and leg, driven straight to midwicket
and is welcomed with a boundary, short and it's pulled between deep midwicket and deep square leg
full outside off, moves away and pushes it wide of extra cover for a single
full toss on middle, driven towards long-on for a single
full outside off, makes room and places it wide of extra cover for a couple of runs
short, slow and too wide, called by the umpire
aiming for the blockhole and gets it right this time, digs it out past the bowler for a single
a meaty full toss and Haddin doesn't waste the opportunity, stands back and sends it into the crowd behind deep midwicket
short on the off, moves back and slaps it wide of long-off for a boundary, came off the meat
just outside leg stump, dragged towards midwicket for a single
stumped, gets some turn, lands on a good length, Haddin steps out of the crease and tries to clear extra cover, misses as it spins away and Dhoni does the rest
pushed gently towards long-off for a single
short and he tries to pull it through square leg, deliberately bowled outside leg stump after the batsman had made way
fires it full on middle, Hussey can only dig it out back to the bowler
tight line to start with, bowls it on a good length on middle, White defends it into the off side
fuller, its struck through midwicket into the deep for a single
four, slightly slower there, waited for it after it landed short, made room and pulled it powerfully wide of long-on
slower one again, bowled on a length on middle and he didn't appear to pick it, tried to clear long-on but failed, Vijay took it comfortably a few yards inside the ropes
full on the off, driven towards long-off for a single
nipped back in a hint from the off, defended cautiously back to the bowler
full toss on the off, smacked towards long-off for just the single
a couple this time, full toss again, swung wide of long-on for a quick two
bowls it full on the off, mistimes it towards long-on for a single
leading edge there, low full toss outside leg stump, tried to close the face to play it fine, played a touch too early and it lobbed behind Zaheer
landed on a good length outside off, Hussey, surprisingly, left it alone, probably thought that was a wide but it clearly wasn't
inswinging yorker from Zaheer, tries to force it through midwicket, can only manage a single towards point
slower one, dragged past midwicket into the deep for a couple
low full toss on the off, driven in the wide long-on region for a couple more
swing and a miss, slower one, Hussey comes down the track and tries to launch him over midwicket, makes no contact, a dot ball
excellent stuff from Nehra, short of a good length, tries to slap it past the bowler, mistimes it straight back to him
yorker and the leg stump is knocked out, superb bowling from Nehra this final over, in the blockhole, Hussey tries to cart it through midwicket, misses and is bowled
tries to slog him over midwicket, gets an inside edge onto his pads and snatches a single
